editgpt-desc: Introduce ChatGPT in the editing interface so that users can polish or modify the content of the page.
editgpt-welcome-info: Welcome to EditGPT. Enter your question and call ChatGPT.
apihelp-editgptrequest-summary: EditGPT module to send requests to API.
editgpt-request-sending: The request has been sent, please wait for the server to respond.
editgpt-request-empty: Please enter information, empty requests cannot be sent.
editgpt-request-failed: The request is wrong, please check the browser network settings or site API settings.
